forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Foggy early, becoming sunny this afternoon. High 19C. Winds ENE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Foggy early, becoming sunny this afternoon. High 64F. Winds ENE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.fcttext_metric: Some clouds. Low 12C. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Some clouds. Low 53F. Winds S at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly cloudy skies. Slight chance of a rain shower. High 19C. Winds SSE at 15 to 30 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly cloudy skies. Slight chance of a rain shower. High around 65F. Winds SSE at 10 to 20 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers early, becoming a steady rain late. Low 13C. Winds S at 25 to 40 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers early, becoming a steady rain late. Low 54F. Winds S at 15 to 25 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A steady rain early...then remaining cloudy with a few showers. High 14C. Winds SW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers in the morning becoming more intermittent in the afternoon. High 56F. Winds SW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers early becoming less numerous late. Low 8C. Winds SSW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers in the evening becoming more intermittent overnight. Low 46F. Winds SSW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers in the morning, then partly cloudy in the afternoon. High 12C. Winds SW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers in the morning, then partly cloudy in the afternoon. High 53F. Winds SW at 15 to 25 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. Low 9C. Winds S at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with showers. Low 48F. Winds S at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain early with thunderstorms developing in the afternoon. High 12C. Winds S at 25 to 40 km/h. Chance of rain 90%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain with thunderstorms by evening. High 53F. Winds S at 15 to 25 mph. Chance of rain 90%.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain. Low 8C. Winds S at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with periods of rain. Low 46F. Winds S at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Light rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers in the afternoon. Thunder possible. High 11C. Winds SW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Steady light rain in the morning. Showers continuing in the afternoon. Thunder possible. High 52F. Winds SW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. Low 7C. Winds S at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. Low 44F. Winds S at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy. High 12C. SE winds shifting to WNW at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Sunshine and clouds mixed. High 53F. SE winds shifting to WNW at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly clear skies. Low 7C. Winds WNW at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A few clouds from time to time. Low 43F. Winds NW at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly to mostly cloudy. High 14C. Winds WSW at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Intervals of clouds and sunshine in the morning with more clouds for later in the day. High 56F. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy during the evening. A few showers developing later during the night. Low 7C. Winds SW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 30%.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy. Low 44F. Winds SW at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain developing later in the day. High 13C. Winds S at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Becoming cloudy with occasional rain in the afternoon. High around 55F. Winds S at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.fcttext: Rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers late. Low near 45F. Winds SW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 60%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy in the morning. Increasing clouds with periods of showers later in the day. High 13C. Winds SW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
